name: Snails, Dust and Blow
description:
A stupid game (inspired by a wii party minigame) about Snails, Cannons and Drugs.

After the death of Snailo Escobar, four street gangs started a turf war for control of the drug trade. Fight the best warriors from the other clans at the cocaine drop points, like a disco toilet sink or a neighbor's garden (WIP). 

Supports 2 to 4 players in local, bots might be added later if I feel like it. Game is very buggy. Most graphics are also just placeholders, might replace them to make it more consistent with the theme. Idk.
